property.description: If selected code for parameter checking is included in the build.

constraint.display: Unique name required for each instance
Name must be a valid C symbol

property.constraint: testSymbol("${module.middleware.motor_position.name}")

constraint.display: Must be a valid non-negative value.

property.constraint: eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.u2_pos_dead_band}";' + 'var regex_int = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_int_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([0-9]+)?U$","i");' + ' ( regex_int.test(input) || regex_int_with_suffix.test(input))')

constraint.display: Must be a valid non-negative value.

property.constraint: eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.u2_pos_band_limit}";' + 'var regex_int = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_int_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([0-9]+)?U$","i");' + ' ( regex_int.test(input) || regex_int_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f_speed_ff_ratio}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f_encoder_cpr}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f_pos_omega}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f_speed_ctrl_period}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

property.description: IPD LPF process enable or disable

property.constraint: eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_ipd_pos_kp_ratio}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_ipd_pos_ff_ratio}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_ipd_speed_k_ratio}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_ipd_err_limit_1}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_ipd_err_limit_2}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_ipd_lpf_omega}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_ipd_lpf_zeta}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

constraint.display: Must be a valid non-negative value.

property.constraint: eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.u2_interval_time}";' + 'var regex_int = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_int_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([0-9]+)?U$","i");' + ' ( regex_int.test(input) || regex_int_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_accel_time}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_max_accel}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_accel_max_speed}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_timer_update_step}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')
testInteger("${module.middleware.motor_position.u2_mtr_pp}") && (${module.middleware.motor_position.u2_mtr_pp} >=0)

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_mtr_r}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_mtr_ld}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_mtr_lq}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_mtr_m}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_position.f4_mtr_j}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')
